thread.title: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare Update Live on PC, Xbox One, PlayStation 4
thread.title_full: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare Update Live on PC, Xbox One, PlayStation 4 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare Update Live on PC, Xbox One, PlayStation 4
text: Video game developer Infinity Ward and publisher Activision are announcing that they are launching an entirely new major update for Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare on the PlayStation 4 from Sony, the Xbox One from Microsoft, and the PC. The full list of tweaks made to the first-person shooter can be seen by clicking on the button at the end of this article. The two companies are aiming to eliminate some of the bugs that the community has been noticing, linked to maps and ... Â»
